name: Dynamic Crypto Art - possibilities sketch

{"name": "Dynamic Crypto Art - possibilities sketch 1/500", "description": "Just some thoughts on dynamic crypto art. 

A few Solidity based tech triggers that can cause different kinds of changes in the artwork. Not comprehensive but maybe useful to see a few of them laid out.

Already did transfer/degrade w '99c' so feel free to fork the transfer code there (0xf91d406e1a096225e6408150D0F8fd876bfc7238) if you're interested.

-

Tech:
-Transfer
-Time (shared time / from start of owning / approach a future time)
-Wallet contents
-Wallet specific (dynamic continuous or mint and permanent)
-Create

b�> (Rate of change) b�>

Art:
-Degrade
-Disintegrate
-Rotate through works
-Improve/build/stack
-Perspective
-Time
-Versions
